title: SQLALL Keyword

metadata.description: Learn about SQLALL Keyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Reference

❯
ALL
The
ALL
command returns true if all of the subquery values meet 
the 
condition.
The following SQL statement returns TRUE and lists the productnames if ALL 
the records in the OrderDetails table has quantity = 10:
Example
SELECT ProductName
FROM Products
WHERE ProductID = ALL (SELECT ProductID FROM OrderDetails WHERE Quantity = 10);

Reference

❯
★
+1
